name: Cube Attack 2
description:
This is a very simple game. The enemys will come from all different directions and you have to shoot them with the WASD keys. Also JAVA IS REQUIRED. (Note: This game is not complete yet.)

Thanks to:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOs7Q7IeuzgRyARaEqif75A: RealTutsGML.

I used his tutorials to make the base engine for this game.

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/explosion-animation-10345/: The explosion animation used in this game.
